title: The Love Cult (1966)
description:
THE LOVE CULT (1966)

Something Weird Video

MPEG-4 encoded from DVD-R

A lousy magician, with his faithful wife & stage assistant, starts a "sex cult" and becomes fabulously successful, for a while.  But he surrounds himself with bad people and his days as a cult leader are numbered.

Supposedly made in 1966, but there is a spliced-in softcore sex scene that looks more like 1968 or '69, given the hairstyles and such. The cast of oily characters seem more like outcasts from the 1950s, but the IMDb says 1966 and I'll just have to accept that.

IMDb also says Barry Mahon directed this film under a pseudonym, but I find that difficult to believe because it's much more competently made than any Mahon film, so why wouldn't he put his name on it?

Not a great film, but the subject matter is interesting.

Also, there is a moralizing narrator to remind you, or persuade you, of how evil this love cult business is. He grows more contemptuous, pompous and self-righteous as the film progresses.

Torrent includes feature film and original trailer, which is far better than the film itself.
